name: Hecate's Healing Hut
description:
Brew potions to cure your patients. Watch out for the timer, patients get impatient as the game goes on. Help as many as you can and rack up stars. Use the spellbook in the lower left to look up recipes. Order matters!

Character and Item Artist - Jess Graziani
Menu and Dialog Programmer - Jacob Heft
Environment and Background Artist - Kevin Houck
Soundtrack Composer - Alex Lukens
Gameplay Programmer - Jesse Whitworth
